name: Horror Ship Task
description:
Controls :
  • W/A/S/D - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • F - Interact
  • Alt F4 - Quit Game (W.I.P Feature ; Sorry)
  • Q - Flashlight (W.I.P)
How To Play :

Press F in Front of the "Ship Computer"  to START the Game.

You will have 5 minutes to find the 3 Puzzles in the Ship and complete them.

Keep an eye at your Oxygen Bar, if it reaches 0, you lose the game. To fill it, find the room containing the "Oxygen Filler", complete the puzzle and your oxygen will then be filled up.

Be careful, a weird looking skeleton is patrolling in the ship, if you encouter him, he can stuns you for 5 seconds.

Known Issue(s)  / Bugs:
  • [ISSUE] Stuck in a Puzzle ?
    • Press F (Interact Key)
  • [ISSUE] Weird Pink Textures ?
    • Try downloading the .exe (These textures are temporary)
  • [BUG] "Car" is going out of the Puzzle Area
    • F key should cancel the Puzzle, try again.
